name: MAIDEN
description:
MAIDEN is a narrative first-person graphic adventure game in the "dungeon crawler" style of Myst.  

Set in 1640s New England, you play a newlywed Puritan woman searching for your missing husband.  You trace his whereabouts to a remote manor owned by a succubus - a female demon of folklore who seduces men in their dreams and feeds on them through sexual intercourse. 

THIS GAME IS A PROOF-OF-CONCEPT THAT USES ASSETS FROM THIRD PARTY SOURCES THAT ARE NOT THE INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY OF THE GAME'S CREATOR.
